Developer Information

Please provide your personal developer details

{/* Personal Information */}

Personal Information

handleInputChange('fullName', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="Enter your full name" required />
handleInputChange('email', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="your.email@example.com" required />
handleInputChange('streetAddress', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="123 Developer Street, Apt 4B" required />
handleInputChange('city', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="Tech City" required />
handleInputChange('stateProvince', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="California / Ontario / Bavaria" required />
handleInputChange('postalCode', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="12345 / A1B 2C3 / 12345-678" required />
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Information

handleInputChange('phoneNumber', e.target.value)} className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-r-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="(555) 123-4567" required />
handleInputChange('username', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="your_username" required />
{/* Preferences */}

Preferences

{/* Social Media & Online Presence */}

handleInputChange('developerTwitter', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="https://x.com/yourusername" />
handleInputChange('developerFacebook', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="https://facebook.com/yourprofile" />
handleInputChange('developerInstagram', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="https://instagram.com/yourusername" />

handleInputChange('developerGithub', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 text-sm" placeholder="https://github.com/yourusername" />
{/* Developer Assets */}
